channel.title: Why does the search function suck?
channel.description:
On every occasion that I've used the forums search function I've never got the results I've wanted.
There must be some reason why it fails so bad?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I can’t get any moparscape results on this forum…

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:13, topic:283779”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=375047.msg2831419#msg2831419 date=1245381930]

Actually the way it works now it only shows the moparisthebest boards here, and only the moparscape boards on moparscape. Isn’t that the way to go?
[/quote]

Really? I must be confusing it with something else. I know I often get that “The topic you are looking for doesn’t exist, maybe it’s on MITB/Moparscape instead” page…[/quote]

I know it doesn’t allow those boards to be checked or unchecked, I’m not sure SMF goes ahead and searches them anyway, as the thread starter says, it ‘sucks’.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Actually the way it works now it only shows the moparisthebest boards here, and only the moparscape boards on moparscape. Isn’t that the way to go?

Really? I must be confusing it with something else. I know I often get that “The topic you are looking for doesn’t exist, maybe it’s on MITB/Moparscape instead” page…

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

At the bottom of the search page, there is a checkbox that says ‘Check all’. Toggling it naturally toggles every other forum/subforum checkbox. How long would it take to whip up another checkbox that says “Search moparscape boards” that would toggle and untoggle all the moparscape sections?

Actually the way it works now it only shows the moparisthebest boards here, and only the moparscape boards on moparscape. Isn’t that the way to go?

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

At the bottom of the search page, there is a checkbox that says ‘Check all’. Toggling it naturally toggles every other forum/subforum checkbox. How long would it take to whip up another checkbox that says “Search moparscape boards” that would toggle and untoggle all the moparscape sections?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

regex search would be nice
then again i never use search anyway

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:8, topic:283779”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=375047.msg2826917#msg2826917 date=1245092516]
Having 99999 moparscape results and 1 irrelevant mitb result is getting rather annoying, indeed.
SMF 2.0 is turning into Duke Nukem Forever.
[/quote]

Use http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search

Instead of the search bar, and you won’t get moparscape results. You can also select which forums to search.[/quote]

Yea, I didn’t even know you could get results from the other board.

Either way though, after the upgrade to 2.0 I will probably install and configure sphinx full text search which should be much faster, more reliable, and return better results.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the search function suck?

item.title: Why does the search function suck?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:3, topic:283779”]Having 99999 moparscape results and 1 irrelevant mitb result is getting rather annoying, indeed.
SMF 2.0 is turning into Duke Nukem Forever.[/quote]

Use http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search

Instead of the search bar, and you won’t get moparscape results. You can also select which forums to search.
